statements: DELETE FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE organization_id = 100 AND healthcare_access_score > 80.0;
DELETE FROM healthcare_disparities WHERE population_group = 'Senior Citizens' AND healthcare_utilization_score < 50.0;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 60 AND patient_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM HealthcareDisparities WHERE disparity_type = 'Healthcare Access';
DELETE FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 101 AND gender = 'Male';
